documents.document: One does not simply walk into a courtroom and testify about a felony. #ThingsBoromirNeverSaid #CareerAdvice

A disingenuous weasel once joined a cohort. A bloated tick then thought "A monster like me needs a victim like this for my atrocities."

What if a 🐩, who thought it was Barack Obama, campaigned for a 😼 who thought it was Jesse Jackson? #BarackObama=#JesseJackson
Barack the 🐩 wanted to be the wind beneath Jesse the 😼's wings. #BarackObama=#JesseJackson
🐩🚩👬✊👭📢😼 (or: 🐩 campaigned for 😼) So at first, Barack the 🐩 campaigned vigorously for Jesse the 😼.
